A CGA version of Keen dreams might also exist.

title: Re: Versions
content: I'm not sure if 1.5 is official as we have no confirmation for it, and while checking out that version there was something that felt a bit strange, can't remember what. But I'm still 75% convinced that it is an official version, a major reason being that a lot of data has been moved around in the exe (i.e. not easy to do for a hacker). This and the fact if a newer CGA version of Keen 6 exists could probably be asked from Joe.

title: Re: Versions
content:
After trying it, I'd call it "a beta of a demo". I noticed that the ending ad tells something like Id Software wasn't going to publish the full game with Apogee as shareware (like what they did with Keen6, that has a 3 level demo).

Why do I call it "beta of a demo"? Simple, this demo's Paddle War has a serious timing bug! You can't play Paddle War with the demo, or they did it intentionally so that for playing Paddle War correctly the player had to buy the retail version of the game. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

Apart from that, the Help screen has a gray background, like the ending sequence of Keen 6 version 1.0, while the Apogee versions of Keen4 shareware and Keen5 retail have a red background, just like the Keen6 v1.4 ending screen. It's kinda interesting to have a small piece of Id Software story in my hard disk.

EDIT: And it seems that the world map music for this demo/beta or whatever it is, is a sketch of the world map music Bobby Prince wrote for the final shareware version. And why do the demo levels have no music? Even the Keen6 demo had music! With this I'm sure it was a Beta of the Keen4 Demo. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [hr]
"Eat your veggies!"

title: updating keen?
content: How am i able to update Keen 4 (v1.1), Keen 5 (v1.0) and Keen 6 (v1.0) to v1.4?  I need to do that for using TED...   (BTW i'm new here!)

title: New Keen!
content: The [url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumtheoriginalcommanderkeenga.showMessage?topicID=591.topic]Official Games Thread[/url] in this same forum is where you want to go. Keen 4 version 1.4 is freely downloadable as shareware, and there are patches available to update Keen 5 and 6.

title: Re: Versions
content:
Now, I'm sure that someone out there has Keen Dreams registered, and knows how to use a hex editor. Would that person like to help me out and fill out the zeroes in this table, pretty please? I only have shareware [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

[pre] table offsets (&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp -size-&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp version&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp headerOffset&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp huffmanOffset&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 213424&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp "1.01 Shareware"&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 0x1E6E0&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 0x2B3D6&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 213536&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp "1.13 Shareware"&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 0x1E720&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 0x2B446&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 000000&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp "1.01"&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 0x00000&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 0x00000&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 000000&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp "1.13"&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 0x00000&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 0x00000&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 000000&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp "1.01"&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 0x00000&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp 0x00000)[/pre]
(don't worry about CGA)

The size column is the unlzexe'd size, for headerOffset you're looking for the location of the start of the following hex string: "000000009D000000A6000000" whilst huffman offset is the start of the following hex string: "6900B50096009A00".

Hex workshop is most excellent for this. I would be very grateful, it would mean I can mark Dreams off my to-do list.

Cheers in advance!------------------
[url=http://www.szevvy.net]www.szevvy.net[/url], for all your Wombat needs. You know you want to.
A member of the LevelLord fan club.

title: Re: Versions
content:
Thank you muchly!

A step by step guide:

1. Unlzwexe the exe (you can give it a different name so you don't overwrite the orginial)
2. Download Hex Workshop from [url=http://www.bpsoft.com/downloads/index.html]www.bpsoft.com/downloads/index.html[/url]
3. Right-click on the unlzexe'd exe, and click 'hex edit with hex workshop'
4. Down the very bottom of the window, from left to right you have: 'ready', 'offset: 0', 'value: somenumber', 'somenumber bytes'. The value in 'somenumber bytes' is the size. This is the first thing I need.
5. Go to edit->find. Change 'type' to 'hex values', and set the value to "000000009D000000A6000000" (without quotes), then OK.
6. Remember how down the bottom you have 'offset: somenumber'? The somenumber is what I need - this gives me the header offset.
7. Repeat steps 6-7 for the hex string "6900B50096009A00". This gives me the huffman offset.

I'd simply ask for a registered exe, apply patches and do everything myself...but that would be illegal, right? This way it'd be legit, I in no way condone sending the exes of all the versions to szevvy@hotmail.com, in no way at all. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ------------------
[url=http://www.szevvy.net]www.szevvy.net[/url], for all your Wombat needs. You know you want to.
A member of the LevelLord fan club.

title: Re:  Re: Versions
content:
The compression on Dreams is identical to Keen 4-6. The only difference is that you use 4-byte offsets instead of 3, and there's only 1 or 2 fonts (I *think* - can't remember off the top of my head).

As for the loading screen - I think people on Andy Durdin's forums where trying to get it but it didn't go anywhere - but then again, I've haven't been there in a while.

I'll clarify fonts when I get home - gotta go replace a brand-new XBox 360 cause it don't boot.------------------
